name: useInterval
description: Custom hook that creates an interval that invokes a callback function at a specified delay using the [`setInterval API`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope/setInterval).

props.name: callback
props.description: The function to be invoked at each interval.

props.name: delay
props.description: The time, in milliseconds, between each invocation of the callback. Use `null` to clear the interval.
